channel.title: Search on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Search on ZooBerry

item.title: Search
item.description: Search guide Use * asterisks before or after words to expand results. Do not use the asterisks if looking for exact words. Say we want to find anything with the word Ginger Simply search Ginger without asterisk if looking for Ginger Ging* will find Ginger or other words that start with Ging Ginger* won’t work. If you’re looking for Gingerella though, well, knock yourself out :P ZooBerry is a statically-generated website, which means performing a site search on Google.
